overview: A lonely engineer is intercepted by a young thief, to whom he offers to give all his money with the condition that they share a dinner together. This leads to a conversation that will put their thoughts and faith in life to test.
tagline: The Short film puts on the table the interaction between people of opposite generations and opposite social classes as as a form of resilience. Inspired by Amado Nervo's "En Paz" ("At Peace") poem.
title: At Peace
